website_summaries.verdict: Large and powerful double DIN Bluetooth receiver that offers many customizable features.
pros: Time alignment optimizes music for where you sit in the vehicle
Customizable display, colors, and brightness control
cons: Some users have issues with flashing screens

customer_reviews.title: ... this deck in my car and so far so good. I purchased the X390BS because it was this ...
customer_reviews.text: I just finished installing this deck in my car and so far so good. I purchased the X390BS because it was this years model and had several updates/upgrades over the previous year. The install was easy and sound quality is excellent. It was easy to customize the colours to match my interior and most settings seem pretty intuitive. The AppRadio Live app is cool as you get free GPS via your phone etc but it's a very different platform than the rest of the system so it's a whole additional thing to figure out. Drawbacks: takes about 10 seconds to resume BT audio playback on startup. I'll update as I get to know it better.
customer_reviews.author: briandrew1

customer_reviews.title: Great deck with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Tons of features and easy to connect altough the apps do kind of suck for the phone. Lets just list the pros and cons as i say below. Pros -50w gives great speaker power delivery -big screen -seperate subwoofer channel (very common) -seperate subwoofer volume control -bright screen with big letters -usb or bluetooth -lots of features Neutral- advanced EQ only Cons -Small buttons -stupid parking brake restriction to even setup bluetooth -bluetooth seems very weak with it cutting out even standing next to an open driver door with it -no integration without an extra device to sterring wheel controls. Overall i do love the deck but i would love some changes to the unit
customer_reviews.author: ReadySetGameTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Wow, really nice
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I love it, synced to my Android phone, sound is crisp and clean, 2 av inputs so I have a front lic plate camera and rear, really easy to use, I am really enjoying it a great deal, installed in a 2010 dodge ram 2500 mega cab.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Nice Radio!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome radio for the money ! can upload custom screensaver as a background , runs headrest TV's backup camera , the dvd player works awesome and good screen ! radio has alot of power and audio settings and colors you can change or custom tune ... good deal for the money i love it !
customer_reviews.author: Kenneying

customer_reviews.title: custom wallpaper from a USB drive
customer_reviews.text: I bought and installed this to replace a Jensen VX-7020 that stopped working. Couldn't be happier with this purchase. Pioneer is much better quality with good features. The night dimming feature works very well and I really like being able to turn off the display at night. Uploading custom wallpaper from a USB drive was not easy. It doesn't tell you in the directions but you have to change the phone settings to USB in order for the system to recognize a USB flash drive.
customer_reviews.author: Jim T.

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer does it again
customer_reviews.text: Love this deck I have the ultimate audio video experience in my truck dvd cd hdmi Netflix Spotify pandora you name it I got it.... works great with my 15 inch subs when watching a movie u have true theater experience........
customer_reviews.author: Maleek

customer_reviews.title: Not stock
customer_reviews.text: Okay Just okay In my case, lost steering wheel control No easy mute button Remote is okay, but who’s going to use that Sounds okay Lost use of my factory dual band antenna This is bad for am And fm So just let me say....meh, it works but only marginally better than stock
customer_reviews.author: Metlchip

customer_reviews.title: Failing Head unit.
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit, lot's of features and easily installed. Instructions were very well though out and displayed. I highly recommend this Stereo for some serious, high quality sound. UPDATE (1/15/2020) I bought this 6-7 months ago, it is now messing up big time ruining the quality of my music. The sound is muffled (going in and out) unless you turn off the display. Changed my review from 5 stars to 1. For a $200+ dollar stereo, I'd expect to get more than a half a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Allen

customer_reviews.title: Ui sucks, display is good, sound adjustments are amazing, connectivity was good, rca went bad.
customer_reviews.text: After using the head unit for three months, the front right rca output went bad and produced only static. This affected not only the music, but the Bluetooth output as well. Hopefully I'll get an exchange or refund.
customer_reviews.author: yeppers

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 6.7 out of ten. I hate that it sometimes charges my android phone one day, then another day it doesn't read it and won't charge it. But the sound and functions are good not great and the price is a little steep. I wouldn't buy this for someone as a gift though and I wouldn't buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Godfrey Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model because it has cd and dvd and love it. So much better than my stock unit. Paired it with the metro wiring kit for super easy installation in my 3rd gen 4Runner. Note: keep the brackets off the stock unit and install them on this player using only 3 screws that line up. Also need to remove the stock amp under the stock unit 2 screws to access the 2 plugs your metro wiring kit plugs into.
customer_reviews.author: HIredbeard

customer_reviews.title: Great for Android
customer_reviews.text: Instructions give most but not all the details. Great for android phones but a little different and not so friendly with apps on iPhones. I’ll shell out the extra cash to get a CarPlay model for iPhone next time. The functions take a bit of getting used to. It works ok with my backup cam, but the “view camera” option will not work if you use a wireless setup, it must be hardwired. My wireless setup makes the view sometimes give a distorted pic. Would be better if it had anti glare. Very hard to see if the sun is on it.
customer_reviews.author: USMC Retired

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I Installed this double din couple months ago. No complaints for the price. The touch screen is pretty responsive. I have enjoyed it with no issues. Mirror mode is grainy using navigation but it will get you to your destination either way. DVD player is nice, bluetooth connection is solid and the Mic is a must for hands free while driving. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan & Martha

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth drops out
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this stereo but it has 1 major flaw. It drops it's Bluetooth connection quite frequently. It started as a small pause here or there every few song but now it's gotten more frequent. Recently I counted 6 drops in 1 song. It's gotten so annoying I'm about to purchase another stereo after just spending $200 on this one 6 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Green

customer_reviews.title: Severely disappointed in this
customer_reviews.text: Was on my way to work this morning and the screen just completely stops working!?!!! I was hoping that it would get more than 9 months of use!!! Severely disappointed in this radio
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Geat Product from Pioneer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, No lag when you go through the menus like the Kenwoods. Pioneer reliability, 1 year of owner ship and I'm still in love with it. Why pay some dealer thousands of dollar for something that works, sounds, and feels better that you can install yourself for a fraction of the price. For you 2008 Honda Element owners get the Xcorpion Honda Element Double Din Dash Kit my only complain is that sometimes when you skip the song forward it turns off the display since the assigned button is right on top. also Pandora has to be connected on your phone first before you can connect and the Spotify app has a similar problem...Bluetooth work excellent though.
customer_reviews.author: Armando F.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and super cool features compared to my old factory stereo!
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in about a hour and a half in my Toyota Highlander, The longest part was soldering all the connection together. I had also purchased a "Metra 70-1761 Radio Wiring Harness For Toyota" that soldered to the connector that came with this Pioneer stereo. I have about a 10mm gap on both sides of the stereo as it sits in the spot where I removed the factory stereo. Don't know what I can do about that?
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey a

customer_reviews.title: 2007 Jeep Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing and works very well. Fit perfect in my 2007 jeep wrangler. Had to buy brackets to make it fit. Only one issue when putting it in- there is a metal bracket that holds the stock stereo in place(behind the stereo) you need to take it out so the pioneer can fit in. Had to use bolt cutters to get the bracket out. Besides that, this stereo is great and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: This unit offers a multitude of great features. The screen is responsive and the audio ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit offers a multitude of great features. The screen is responsive and the audio quality is great thanks to the equalizer. It's hooked up to two Polk 6.5s and OE 2.75 dash speakers. Bluetooth connection is quick and seamless and Spotify streams great over it. If you have an iPhone and hook it up with a lightning cable, download tha Pioneer app and you can have basic navigation. It's features essentially make it like an Apple Carplay head unit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE AND AWSOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I REPLACED THIS RADIO IN PLACE OF THE AVH-200EX THAT I BOUGHT NEW AND RETURNED IT WITHIN 4 DAYS. THE UNIT IS VERY NICE, BUT WAS A BAD APPLE FROM THE BASKET AND RARE ACCORDING TO PIONEER. INSTEAD, I GOT THIS UNIT FOR $50 MORE AND SO HAPPY THAT I DID THIS. THIS HAS A LOT MORE FEATURES AND SCREEN OPTIONS FOR BRIGHTNESS AND I AM ABLE TO SEE THE SCREEN MUCH BETTER IN DAYLIGHT AND EVEN BETTER AT NIGHT. THIS IS WELL WORTH THE MONEY AND IS THE BEST RADIO I HAVE BOUGHT OVER THE YEARS WITH PIONEER AND WILL HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS TO EVERYONE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stereo/DVD player
customer_reviews.text: I put this myself in my 2006 Ford Escape 3.0 along with a backup camera. I also connected the top mounted TV I already had and now it mirrors the image so the back passengers can watch as well. PS remember to connect the USB cable in the back if you want to charge your phone every now and then while listening to Spotify. Because once you put it in, it is a pain to remove and connect and route the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Flawed
customer_reviews.text: Good upgrade for my car. There are few gripes that I hate. The most important flaw being the repeat/shuffle setting. It resets itself if you hit the rewind button or play search to play a different song.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Neckbeard

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer good stereo
customer_reviews.text: So far this stereo has been a winner for me. I got my regular radio stations, my spotify, and my sirus radio set up in it and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Better features than advertised
customer_reviews.text: It has USB and aux input in the back and comes with a long USB extension. I ran those cables from the back to the floor and out near the center console. Bluetooth connection is solid and shows phone contacts by name on the display. The microphone wire is long and mostly hidden behind dash and up to the visor.
customer_reviews.author: Debt Free Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my work van, for the money you cant go wrong. Its a little wonkey trying to get the GPS to by pass the safety software, just by the chip to bypass the parkbrake deal and youll be set. Its a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Ehh do your research before you spend this much for a radio.
customer_reviews.text: Can't use map unless you buy the app through your phone, and have to have your phone plugged into it at all times. When your phone is plugged in, you can't use radio or bluetooth or anything to listen to music while using map. Not very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R.

customer_reviews.title: I replaced it with this one and it sounds much better. I used to have a pretty insane stereo ...
customer_reviews.text: The radio in my Volkswagen Jetta died. I replaced it with this one and it sounds much better.I used to have a pretty insane stereo system in my old truck, I was an audio file. Pioneer make some of the best affordable receivers on the market. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: as with the x3800 the bluetooth reception is garbage. but the rest of the radio functions as it should.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Way nicer than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great radio for an awesome price. Bought it for my wife for Christmas, now she's smiling every time she gets out of the car. It's alot nicer than I thought it would be for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Will Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds much better than I expected. The Bluetooth phone feature is incredible! The only issue I have is my rear camera isn’t as easy to hook up as with the last stereo, this one is more involved but I’m sure it’ll work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great stereo for the money. Easy to install. No apple car play or android car play. Bluetooth signal on mine seems to be weak. Other than that, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughters car... HOLY COW! Great price!!! It’s half of what it was at the place we had install it! Perfect quality! Plan on ordering it for my car next!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Swafford

customer_reviews.title: Solid price, unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough stereo for the price, a bit laggy, the layout is quite clunky, but for $200 not bad at all. However, after 3 months the Bluetooth has randomly stopped working. I can’t wven access the Bluetooth settings anymore. If I could do it again I’d spend a couple more bucks for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: So far its a great radio, hooked a camera to it and can ...
customer_reviews.text: So far its a great radio, hooked a camera to it and can see behind me while i listen to music. (Installed in an RV and i pull a trailer) bluetooth works fine and lots of inputs.
customer_reviews.author: miguel roman

customer_reviews.title: Great clear phone connection, better than the cheap knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: Its Pioneer, their app is weak and they ask for so many permissions, I think you may have to give them permission to all your personal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This stereo is awesome, works perfectly and I absolutely love the touch screen functionality it has. Sounds great, we simple to setup and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Porritt

customer_reviews.title: MEH....
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE READ ALL BUYERS. Install wasn't too crazy on Pioneer's end, just Honda. Unfortunately I can't give a better review if you sell a product that says Bluetooth but you have to buy a separate part just to be able to use the Bluetooth function. Also the remote doesn't work. Touch screen isn't very user friendly. I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Heim

customer_reviews.title: Fits s80 2004
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad radio, great sound, a lot of controls. Can’t watch dvd on main screen tho. Even with e brake wire hooked up.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Puts out very good sound without an amp, although I installed an amp as well. I also purchased the video bypass component so I can have video while driving. Very happy with this unit, historically Pioneer has lasted me a very long time with zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: adam e. cantu

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer Quality so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Best head unit for the money easy to install works as it should
customer_reviews.author: G money

customer_reviews.title: Research
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Remote doesn't control all buttons listed? Doesn't seem to get a good radio signal as my factory unit did. Will continue to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Webb

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing so far
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing so far. love the internal crossover and all the audio settings to make the music sound clean and good!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: The time is never right on it, no matter ...
customer_reviews.text: The time is never right on it, no matter how manytimes I set it... it always changes back. other than that its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Gurttron

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend that has a Dodge the same year as mine and now he’s getting one
customer_reviews.author: Thomas  E

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EASY TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much, I installed this in my 09 Honda Accord EX and I am so in love with it, best investment I can have for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing radio for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fully hands free could not be happier with the radio overall. Pandora on it is great main us of the radio is with pandora only down side is still no text message reader but its still a great radio and makes my truck speakers sound even better
customer_reviews.author: Colton Arcaini

customer_reviews.title: It's quick to do commands and has a great sound level
customer_reviews.text: Omg! The sound on this stereo is 2x the sound on the stock one (F-150 XL) and the options are amazing. I could change every color in the stereo system, the buttons, brightness, the wallpaper and there is an equaliser that let's you control the sound. I thought that I would be disappointed but I am over satisfied. The processor is really good, no lag or latency.
customer_reviews.author: hani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great radio installation was a pain to find correct wiring adapters
customer_reviews.author: Josh Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. Purchased as a gift for my husband and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Shunna Harvey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Installed it in my buddies truck worked for awhile then it quit working all together
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works at expected. Touch screen is harder to use going down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Adkisson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth can be a little mess up at times and if you have steering wheel controls just forget about DIY. But it has a lot of power and a lot of options.
customer_reviews.author: Jbonnel

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best head unit for the money that I have owned. It is so easy to use bluetooth connects very fast and it sounds awesome. Only issue is I had to buy mounting hardware separate I thought that was cheesy
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install and alot of features
customer_reviews.text: Alot of settings..easy to install...the only time blutooth drops is when your phone is a foot away from the car on outside..other than that couldnt ask for better product
customer_reviews.author: Soo.FaDeD

customer_reviews.title: You'll get way more than what you pay for with this stereo.
customer_reviews.text: After reading review after review I have no regrets with my decision in going with this stereo. I highly recommend, loved it so much I bough a second one for my wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: NitroBurner

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth calls don't work
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth does not work. I can hear people but they can't hear me. It only works for music but calls, no.
customer_reviews.author: Jamel Sobers

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading from factory to this and all I can say ...
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from factory to this and all I can say is WOW. I'd suggest getting a backup camera and a Roku Express+ ;) and maybe a hotspot.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: Make sure and purchase a micro bypass switch to install with this unit if you want all the features to work.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Ogre

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: This a great radio. Got this installed to my 2012 altima, and I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxyb

customer_reviews.title: Great unit. Worked great out of the box with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Worked great out of the box with a self install. All features worked flawlessly and connects to bluetooth quickly. Quality unit that's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about buying this radio but are cautious because of the price, don't be. Buy it! It truly is an amazing radio for the price and a phenomenal head unit
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Koslowski

customer_reviews.title: Updated 2003 Camry Sound System
customer_reviews.text: Modernized my wife's 2003 Camry sound system with the Pioneer AVH-X390BS. The installation was easy and took about 40 minutes to complete. Just make sure to get a stereo harness radio install dash kit specifically for your car
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY D SIMS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing radio
customer_reviews.text: I love It came faster than expected the image is so hd
customer_reviews.author: Juan G.

customer_reviews.title: Buen radio
customer_reviews.text: Remote control no work or battery is dead. But I'm happy whit the audio system
customer_reviews.author: roberto priego

customer_reviews.title: No Carplay =(
customer_reviews.text: Wish I read better, this unit does not support apple carplay. Really wanted one that did. There are other Pioneer decks that do for about the same money.
customer_reviews.author: Merma

customer_reviews.title: Great radio, especially for the price, installation was simple and straightforward
customer_reviews.text: Great radio, especially for the price, installation was simple and straightforward so long as you at least have an idea of what you're doing, took about 30 minutes to get it in my truck
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's good enough. Touch screen is okay, bluetooth is iffy sometimes, but for my needs it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: adam nejad

customer_reviews.title: Good radio
customer_reviews.text: Good radio, easy to install and easy to use, have many function enough for me
customer_reviews.author: richard dam

customer_reviews.title: Radio did not even last a year. Output to ...
customer_reviews.text: Radio did not even last a year. Output to the speakers went out. It’s impossible to get in touch with pioneer to get replacement. Don’t buy a pioneer product!
customer_reviews.author: AMY TRAHAN

customer_reviews.title: I like it!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is still a concern!!! I’m not sure I have it set it up right or not!!! But so far, i think it could be better!!! Especially with the higher channel numbers!!
customer_reviews.author: Honorato A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Love this unit
customer_reviews.text: After I got the in-line noise filter I have no complaints. Love this unit.
customer_reviews.author: preachinwildman

customer_reviews.title: So many features
customer_reviews.text: I love my sound system. Haven't used half of the features yet but I was in no way disappointed. Camera feature also works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Miracles

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo, I have had occasional issues with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stereo, I have had occasional issues with the Pandora app connecting but it will play through bluetooth. As others have said it can be hard to see the display when light hits it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Stereo is good. Does have a problem with stalling out and ...
customer_reviews.text: Stereo is good. Does have a problem with stalling out and you have to reset the unit fairly often.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: The eq on this radio is awsome
customer_reviews.text: This is the a great radio lots of new features I own a lot of pioneer double den that cost a lot more than this but by far this radio is the best
customer_reviews.author: Tonio W.

customer_reviews.title: Says big on the box “steering control enabled”.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Says big on the box “steering control enabled”... once installed there is no steering control option. So yes.. feels quite primitive.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: The radio and dvd work well
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I am satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: eloy bugarin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Radio was good when it worked, however it is now just over a year old and out of warranty and the DVD/CD player is not working. We just get an error code.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Head unit performs as expected. Full function capabilities, I can't think of anything else I'd need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wood

customer_reviews.title: Solid overall, sound quality and screen beautiful
customer_reviews.text: After going through multiple double din receivers in my BMW 530i 2001, this one is the one that I am keeping. All the other ones i've tried had sound distortion with my stock amp whether through the RCA outs or the line outs. The screen is beautiful, the response is extremely fast and overall a solid unit. The only thing that concerns me is the FM doesn't show the artist/song info. Bluetooth and everything else works wonderfully however. And as usual, pioneer delivers second to none sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Soeperman

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Actually had to cut the inside of my dash for it to fit my model car. But it was a great buy still, especially for the price. I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Slow interface (dead slow)
customer_reviews.text: When product was installed display was very slow almost dead slow... bad purchase
customer_reviews.author: Najeeb A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stereo. Sometimes the radio goes in and out of Bluetooth. but still good radio for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Polk

customer_reviews.title: Quit producing sound maybe four months after I installed it!
customer_reviews.text: I install this deck in a Truck it work good for 4 months months then the amplifier inside the radio burned out does no longer work and in the processing of figuring it out how to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good looks great works good with rear view camera and bypass cable
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: AVH-X390BS Pioneer rocks
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I spent way too many hours reading reviews and watching YouTube videos before buying this unit. No regrets, I couldn't justify spending an extra $100 for this unit with HD radio (the BHS model). I own a Pioneer unit with HD radio and in my opinion it's overrated. I used my factory amp and sub-wolfer, tweeters and this thing sounds great! Most stereo shops will tell you that Pioneer is the best bang for your buck if their honest.
customer_reviews.author: Daren

customer_reviews.title: The bluetooth Goes out more than I like it too
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pick up all the stations I like to listen to
customer_reviews.author: tonya hosch

customer_reviews.title: It a great item
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful stereo, I am happy it met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: This headunit is junk!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this head unit. It is a peice of junk, it will no longer let me phone connect to it and its only 5 months old.
customer_reviews.author: James driggers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Always liked Pioneer radios from when I was younger. Just installed today in truck and was very pleased. Easy install. YouTube helps. Truck feels like new again. Shipping was fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely pleased
customer_reviews.text: If you’re on the fence just go ahead and order it. You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Korey Blucher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome head unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to figure out al of the controls great aunt quality
customer_reviews.author: Robert norwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio!
customer_reviews.text: It feels like a really high quality product it's very nice and easy to use, it is a good option to replace the oem radio if you want to have a double din radio you will enjoy it

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Very impressed with capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very impressed with capabilities. Connect well with iPhone. Maybe the only minus is the only size of double din screen. Perhaps I would go for 490..
customer_reviews.author: Edyamazaki

customer_reviews.title: This stereo has all the bells and whistles...except for nav....i'll use my smartphone for that.
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly...its for my wifes truck....and she loves it!!

product_meta.title: Pioneer AVH-X390BS Double Din Bluetooth in-Dash DVD/CD/Am/FM Car Stereo Receiver with 6.2 Inch Wvga Screen/Sirius Xm-Ready
product_meta.description: Pioneer AVH-X390BS double din Bluetooth in-dash DVD/CD/am/FM car stereo receiver w/ 6.2" WVGA screen, Sirius xm-ready. Cea-2006 compliant amplifier. Appradio one gives you complete control over Compatible iPhone and Android apps on the radio's screen. Am/FM tuner with 18FM/12Am presets. Remote control included.
feature_bullets: Power output: peak: 50 watts x 4 channels/ RMS: 14 watts x 4 channels
Time alignment optimizes music for where you're sitting in the vehicle
CD text information display: MP3 ID3 tag display (title/artist/album)
